short_summary: Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to 200 Rue Sacr-Cour, Gatineau, QC, J8X 4C6 by March 31, 2024.
description: The purpose of this publication is to invite suppliers interested in providing office furniture to submit a request for bid. The registered supplier will be awarded a supply contract.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Individual Work Surfaces, Monitor Arms, and Power Modules**
-----------------------------------------------------------

**Requisition Details:**

*   Requisition Number: cb-533-19874201
*   Amendment Number: 4
*   Solicitation Number: 10232386
*   Publication Date: December 7, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: December 18, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST

**Procurement Overview:**
------------------------

Canadian Heritage (PCH) is soliciting tenders for the provision of individual work surfaces, monitor arms, and power modules as part of an office furniture requirement. The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

**Product Categories:**
-----------------------

The requirement falls under the following Product Categories of the PCH Supply Arrangement (SA):

*   Product Category 5 - Office Furniture
*   Product Category 15 - Computer Equipment and Peripherals

**Contract Duration:**
-----------------

The contract is anticipated to span from December 19, 2023, to March 31, 2024.

**Accessible Attachments:**
-------------------------

The Request for Proposal (RFP) document is available for download:

<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27000/10232386_request-for-bid----individual-work-surface,motor-arm-and-power-module.pdf>

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

To obtain further information regarding this tender, please contact the contracting authority, Martin Lafleur, at contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca or (000) 000-0000.

**Background:**
-------------

The procurement is being conducted in accordance with the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Supply Arrangement E60PQ-140003/C. The Request for Proposal (RFP) outlines the requirements for the provision of individual work surfaces, monitor arms, and power modules to 200 Rue Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau, QC, J8X 4C6.
